General.Name: Jentech Precision Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Jentech Precision Industrial Co., Ltd manufactures and sells precision molds worldwide. The company's principal products include thermal heat spreaders, insert molding SMD LED and semiconductor lead frames, EV power module coolers, EMI shielding cases, RF coaxial connectors, TV tuner metal chassis products, HDD and floppy drive components, and DPC thin-film ceramic substrate components. It also engages in manufacturing, processing, and trading of electrical appliances, electronics, computers, and other metal parts, as well as hardware machinery and its parts; and metal forging and surface treatment related businesses. The company's products are used in medical, consumer electronics, semiconductor, automotive, appliance, microelectronic, and other industries. Jentech Precision Industrial Co., Ltd was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
